items.question: How do I search for a car?
items.answer: Use the search bar at the top of the homepage to filter by brand, model, price, mileage, and more.

items.question: Can I compare cars?
items.answer: Yes, you can select up to 3 cars and click 'Compare' to view specifications side by side.

items.question: Is registration required to view car details?
items.answer: No, but you must register to contact sellers or save listings.

items.question: Are all listed cars inspected?
items.answer: Yes, every vehicle listed goes through a basic inspection before being approved.

items.question: How frequently are listings updated?
items.answer: Listings are updated in real-time as sellers add or remove vehicles.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and PayPal.

items.question: Is payment secure on your website?
items.answer: Yes, we use SSL encryption and secure gateways for all transactions.

items.question: Can I pay in installments?
items.answer: Yes, for eligible cars, installment plans are available during checkout.

items.question: Do you offer refunds?
items.answer: Refunds are issued if a seller fails to deliver the car within 14 days.

items.question: Are there any hidden charges?
items.answer: No, all charges including tax and service fees are disclosed upfront.

items.question: How do car auctions work?
items.answer: You place bids on live auction cars. The highest bidder when time ends wins the car.

items.question: Is there a bidding fee?
items.answer: A nominal platform fee applies only when you win the bid.

items.question: What happens if I win a bid?
items.answer: You’ll receive an email with payment instructions and pickup/delivery details.

items.question: Can I cancel my bid?
items.answer: Bids cannot be canceled once placed, so please bid responsibly.

items.question: How is bidding time managed?
items.answer: Each auction has a countdown. Late bids extend the time by 2 minutes.

items.question: Can I apply for a loan directly on the site?
items.answer: Yes, fill out the loan form under 'Financing' and get instant quotes.

items.question: How is interest rate determined?
items.answer: It depends on your credit score, loan term, and the vehicle’s value.

items.question: Is pre-approval available?
items.answer: Yes, you can get pre-approved before choosing a vehicle.

items.question: Are there penalties for early repayment?
items.answer: No, we do not charge penalties for early repayment.

items.question: Can I include insurance in my loan?
items.answer: Yes, comprehensive insurance can be bundled with your loan.
